experienceData.title: Frontend Developer Intern
experienceData.description: Gained hands-on experience in frontend development, working with React Vite, TailwindCSS and API integration to create user-friendly web applications. I was part of the team that developed a web application for the ISPIR Center, which is a research and development center at Bulacan State University. I was responsible for implementing the frontend design and functionality, as well as integrating the backend API.
